content: complimentary pattern brentwood throw design by michael vloedman pattern no for use with 202303 woolstok tweed aran for use with woolstok tweed aran brentwood throw design by michael vloedman description warm and cozy this colorful throw knit in woolstok tweed aran is perfect for a chilly day pick five colors to make this must-have throw for your home experience level gauge in stockinette 12 sts and 20 row = 4 advanced beginner size finished measurements 60½ without fringe one height 48 width materials yarn needles 8mm 40 circular needle or size needed to woolstok tweed aran size 11
